skill.name: docs-review
skill.description: Review documentation changes for compliance with the Metabase writing style guide. Use when reviewing pull requests, files, or diffs containing documentation markdown files.
skill.summary: Review documentation changes for compliance with the Metabase writing style guide. Use when reviewin...

security_audit.summary: Only a single instructional markdown file is present with no executable code. No file access, network calls, or environment harvesting patterns were detected.

content.user_title: Review docs for Metabase style compliance
content.value_statement: Documentation reviews can miss style issues and unclear wording. This skill checks markdown changes against the Metabase guide and reports actionable issues.
actual_capabilities: Determine PR or local review mode based on tool availability
Report issues in a numbered, sequential format
Check tone, structure, links, formatting, and examples against the guide
Use a pending GitHub PR review workflow when available
Enforce consistent issue titles and ordering
limitations: Does not edit files or apply fixes automatically
Only covers documentation markdown review, not code logic
PR review mode depends on GitHub MCP tools being available
Style guidance is specific to the Metabase guide

use_cases.title: Preflight doc checks
use_cases.description: Review a markdown file for style and clarity issues before submitting a change.

use_cases.title: Consistent PR feedback
use_cases.description: Generate numbered review issues for documentation diffs in a pull request.

use_cases.title: Guide compliance audit
use_cases.description: Verify that documentation updates follow the Metabase writing style.

prompt_templates.title: Basic doc review
prompt_templates.prompt: Review this markdown change against the Metabase style guide and list any issues in the required numbered format.

prompt_templates.title: Diff focused review
prompt_templates.prompt: Check this documentation diff for tone, clarity, and formatting issues. Report only material issues in order.

prompt_templates.title: PR mode review
prompt_templates.prompt: Review the PR documentation changes and add numbered comments using the pending review workflow.

prompt_templates.title: Strict checklist review
prompt_templates.prompt: Run a full checklist review on these docs changes and flag every material issue with a suggested fix.

output_examples.input: Review this documentation diff for style issues.
output: Issue 1: Formal tone in the introduction and a suggested rewrite
Issue 2: Link text is not descriptive and needs clearer wording

best_practices: Provide the exact markdown or diff so line references are clear
Ask for only material issues to keep feedback focused
Use the standard numbered issue format for easy tracking
anti_patterns: Requesting code logic review in non documentation files
Expecting automatic edits or patch creation

faq.question: What platforms are supported?
faq.answer: Works in local review mode, and supports GitHub PR mode when the MCP GitHub tools are available.

faq.question: What are the review limits?
faq.answer: It only reviews documentation markdown content and focuses on the Metabase style guide.

faq.question: Can it integrate with a PR workflow?
faq.answer: Yes, it can post numbered comments through the pending GitHub PR review workflow.

faq.question: Does it access my data or secrets?
faq.answer: No, the skill instructions do not include any data collection or network calls.

faq.question: What if no issues are found?
faq.answer: It should report no issues and avoid unnecessary feedback.

faq.question: How does it compare to a generic reviewer?
faq.answer: It uses the Metabase style guide and enforces a strict numbered feedback format.
